content: I'll be attending the FHIR Connectathon in Atlanta - there's no CR specific stream identified. Can anyone recommend an alternative that is research-like?
Hmm. That's unfortunate. You'd certainly be welcome on the questionnaires track. Bulk data and CDS hooks also offer good opportunities for the research space.
@Geoff Low , the Clinical Reasoning and EBM-on-FHIR tracks might also be a good fit.

Thanks, I also understand we have an internal project spinning up over here looking at devices so I'll try to dip in to that as well. Questionnaires is very interesting as I'm participating in a ePRO Consortium working group.
